description:
The first mountaineering shoe featuring CE Certification for professional use. Super Ice Evo GTX satisfies all requirements and even more.

Suitable for classic routes, ice climbing and mixed terrains on high altitude. it is ideal for classical routes, glaciers, ice cascades and high altitude mixed rough terrains.

Exclusive antistatic construction, which transfer electrical shocks to the ground, thanks to a matel cable running along the upper and reaching the sole block.

Top quality Perwanger® leather upper and full rubber rand for increased protection.

Primaloft® lining to keep your feet warm and dry during the activity.

Secure closure and easy motion thanks to the extremely functional lacing system.

Smart PU midsole for maximum technicality in action and exclusive Anatomical Heel Technology to protect the heel and keep it in the right position.

Automatic crampons compatible.
name: Kayland - R.O.I. Recreation Outfitters Inc. Super Ice Evo GTX - Mens
